channel.title: [HELP] Errors with adding christmas cracker pulling
channel.description:
So I've been using [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=529174.0]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=529174.0[/url]
Here's my error message: [code]source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:9: error: cannot find symb ol @override ^ symbol: class override location: class ItemOnPlayer source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:26: error: cannot find sym bol o.sendMessage("You pull the Christmas Cracker... "); ^ symbol: variable o location: class ItemOnPlayer source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:28: error: cannot find sym bol if(Misc.random(3) == 1) { ^ symbol: variable Misc location: class ItemOnPlayer source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:29: error: cannot find sym bol o.forcedText = "Yay I got the Cracker!";
^ symbol: variable o location: class ItemOnPlayer source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:30: error: cannot find sym bol o.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; ^ symbol: variable o location: class ItemOnPlayer source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:31: error: cannot find sym bol o.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random (5)*2), 1); ^ symbol: variable Misc location: class ItemOnPlayer source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:31: error: cannot find sym bol o.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random (5)*2), 1); ^ symbol: variable o location: class ItemOnPlayer source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:35: error: cannot find sym bol c.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random (5)*2), 1); ^ symbol: variable Misc location: class ItemOnPlayer source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:37: error: cannot find sym bol c.turnPlayerTo(o.absX, o.absY); ^ symbol: variable o location: class ItemOnPlayer source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:37: error: cannot find sym bol c.turnPlayerTo(o.absX, o.absY); ^ symbol: variable o location: class ItemOnPlayer Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 10 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
And here is my ItemOnPlayer.java [url=http://pastebin.com/dpBXAskt]http://pastebin.com/dpBXAskt[/url]
I see the error with variable o. I'm not sure how to tell it what "o" is. But I also have no idea how to fix the @override error
SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME!! Also if I have to place a certain code in a file other than ItemOnPlayer please state it. Thanks :)
EDIT: Solved

item.title: [HELP] Errors with adding christmas cracker pulling
